snippet.title: Songs of Silence — Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Songs of Silence is a story-rich, fast-paced strategy ⚔ game set in two distinct fantasy worlds threatened by the all-devouring Silence. 
🔜 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chimeraent/songs-of-silence
✅ Wishlist on Steam https://bit.ly/SongsOfSilence
🔥 Join the closed beta https://forms.gle/exeqdLnAcHFL3W958
👉 Join our Discord https://discord.gg/W8UVyjMr92

The game features a fresh mix of turn-based kingdom management, exploration, and hero development, contrasted with short and intense real-time battles.

Unleash your armies in exciting real-time battles and support them by casting powerful combat spells from your heroes. With more than 100 different units available, there’s plenty of deep customization when constructing your army. Engagements are decisive and focused, only lasting around a minute!

Songs of Silence also features a soundtrack by legendary composer Hitoshi Sakimoto, best known for scoring Final Fantasy Tactics, Final Fantasy 12, and Valkyria Chronicles.
